sentences.sContent: ...daytime temperatures of up to forty degrees centigrade.
The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in centigrade.
sentences.sCn: 底部的数字为建议性摄氏度水温。

synos.tran: 摄氏的；[仪]摄氏温度的；百分度的

words.tran: 百分之一的；百分的；百进制的

trans.tranOther: Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
